text: Hey <@UEZJ74UN8> if you want to set a property (in this case email). Youâ€™ll want to set up an identify call before your trackEvent call to set the email address <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/tracking_code_api/identify_visitor>

Hi Zach. I not to sure if I want to set a property or not. The end goal is really to have a record of everyone who logins to that page so I could create a list of those contacts who are logging in from the list tool in HubSpot. What else am I missing to accomplish this?

Just the identify method. Essentially the `trackEvent` method tells HubSpot that the login happened. The `identify` method tells HubSpot who did the logging in. You need that to create a list of people
